  • Method Details

    • insert

      public static int insert(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Add an appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title
      description - the description
      location - the location
      type - the type
      start - the start date and time
      end - the end date and time
      createDate - the date and time the appointment was created
      createdBy - the original user who created the appointment
      lastUpdate - the date and time the appointment was last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the last user to update the appointment
      customerId - the associated customer ID
      userId - the associated user ID
      contactId - the associated contact ID
      Returns:
      number of rows inserted, or -1 if insert failed

    • update

      public static int update(int id, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Update an appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the appointment ID
      title - the title
      description - the description
      location - the location
      type - the type
      start - the start date and time
      end - the end date and time
      createDate - the date and time the appointment was created
      createdBy - the original user who created the appointment
      lastUpdate - the date and time the appointment was last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the last user to update the appointment
      customerId - the associated customer ID
      userId - the associated user ID
      contactId - the associated contact ID
      Returns:
      number of rows updated, or -1 if update failed
